titleStmt.title: A declaration of Sir William Batten, late Vice-Admirall for the Parliament concerning his departure from London, to His Highnesse the Prince of Wales.
titleStmt.author: Batten, William, Sir, d. 1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Concerns the loss of his commission and the sequestering of his estate.
